But you aren't buying it as a product. It's a donation towards the server, you can't just ask for something else a year later. Its the same if I bought you a cookie 3 weeks ago and you ate it, now I want that cookie back because I had feels for it. You can't really give it back and there isn't any point in replacing it cause its just a cookie... Same with the pets and key.
